note:
Devio.us admin, software developer and system administrator.

Formerly https://social.devio.us/@brycec, https://bsd.network/@brycec

I like old and retro computers, combining nostalgia and interesting challenges in the landscape of "modern computers." I dabble in embedded development, ham radio, languages and telescopes. I write code, engineer and administer systems for a living. Follower of "hack up or shutup".

I randomly post, somewhat random things, and moderately random intervals. And I periodically vent under the CW "rant".

Don't be a dick.
